name: react-redux-boilerplate
description: simple react boilerplate using npm scripts

scripts.first-run:styles: node-sass -r --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --source-map-embed --include-path node_modules/susy/sass --include-path node_modules/breakpoint-sass/stylesheets src/styles/ -o dist/styles
scripts.watch:js: watchify src/scripts/index.jsx -o dist/scripts/bundle.js -v -t [ babelify --presets [ react es2015 ] ]
scripts.watch:styles: node-sass -wr --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --source-map-embed --include-path node_modules/susy/sass --include-path node_modules/breakpoint-sass/stylesheets src/styles/ -o dist/styles
scripts.build:styles: node-sass -r postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' < dist/styles/main.css | postcss --use cssnano > dist/styles/main.min.css
scripts.start: npm-run-all --parallel first-run:styles start:server browsersync watch:js watch:styles
